text.text_translated: Between 100,000 and 50,000 years ago, we start to see the first signs of early human societies, for example in cave paintings, but no one knows the connection between this development and language. Brains did not suddenly get bigger during this time, but humans became more complex and intelligent. Did using language cause their brains to develop, or did their more complex brains start to produce language? It is not clear.
